name: Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A futuristic foam that bulks up fine, thin, flat hair without disturbing the cuticle so hair keeps its glow and looks and feels thick, healthy, and luxe..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, and Curly.Hair Texture:Fine.Hair Concerns:- Thinning.Key Benefits:- Visibly thickens, adds long-lasting weightless volume.Highlighted Ingredients:- Proprietary Polymer Complex (Inflatable Molecular-Chain Technology): Visibly creates weightless, strand-thickening bulk on hair‚Äôs surface..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Unlike typical volumizers, this futuristic foam uses new volumizing tech to visibly add weightless bulk to the surface of each hair without dehydrating or damaging the essential cuticle layer. It delivers big, bold, sexy volume and leaves hair looking glossy, healthy, and feeling naturally thick, never stiff. This product is also a heat protectant.
ingredients: -Proprietary Polymer Complex (Inflatable Molecular-Chain Technology): Visibly creates weightless, strand-thickening bulk on hair‚Äôs surface..-Bamboo Extract: Natural amino acids strengthen, protect color, and promote shine...Aqua/Water, Propanediol, VP/DMAPA Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Disodium EDTA, Benzalkonium Chloride, Bambusa Arundinacea Leaf Extract, Polyquaternium-22.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to damp hair. .-Dispense two to three pumps‚Äô worth of foam into hands and pull through a section of hair from top to ends. Continue until all hair is covered. .-Comb through to distribute evenly.  .-Style. Can be blow-dried or air-dried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in one of the holiday gift sets and was not expecting much out of this - but now I use it after every wash! I have fine 2a hair that is half wavy half straight, prone to lots of frizz and fly aways. I put this in and blow dry after every wash and it gives me days and days of smooth soft hair! It doesn't add much volume, but the softness, shine, and frizz control has made it a new staple in my routine! Does not weigh down my thin hair or make it crunchy or dry at all! you seriously wouldn't even know I had product in with this! They should honestly advertise it as a frizz control/smooth/shine mousse instead of volumizing

reviews.review_text: I am a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador and this is my authentic review of this product. I have flat fine hair naturally and I achieved soo much volume with this product. I sectioned my hair and used about 1 and a half pumps per section to my damp hair. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. After using this a few times now, I have found the technique that works for me. I rough blow dried my curly, thin hair until it was mostly dry but not too dry so I could manipulate the curls. I blow dried my hair in sections, starting with the bottom third of my hair. I used half a pump on each side of each third. I like how this leaves my hair feeling. It gives it texture without being crispy. I also noticed that because of the little extra texture I get at the roots, my hair lasts a bit longer between washes. Or at least it looks fresher than it normally does. My scalp gets oily, normally, and my hair typically falls flat quickly, so the product really makes a difference.  So far, this is my favorite volumizing mousse I have tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Color Wow‚Äôs Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer is helpful when I want to add volume to my hair. As the instructions and other reviewers note, it does perform better when applied in sections. I appreciate that it doesn‚Äôt cause any greasiness or filminess, and I do not detect much of a scent. The texture is kind of a watery foam, and it‚Äôs easy to apply evenly. After styling my hair, I notice that it seems fuller and more voluminous as well as less frizzy. Although my hair seems slightly more difficult to brush out after using it and a tad drier, that‚Äôs the case with all volumizing products for me because my hair is fine and somewhat damaged. Overall, it‚Äôs an effective product for increasing volume, and I also appreciate the added benefit of heat protection. I received this product as a free sample to review.

My hair came out voluminious and fresh, no dry shampoo required (and upon waking up, it still looks clean, as opposed to dry shampoo on greasy hair!)! I notice that there are a lot of negative reviews on this product. It could be that it adds a lot of protein to your hair. I have fine, silky hair and do notice that my regular mousse adds more moisture, so I'm not sure if I am going to use this as my day to day mousse as it's less hydrating than the one I use, but it definitely is a good product to add in your arsenal.
